name: Swift Mailman
description:
This game was made for the Area of Effect game jam with the theme: "Message received".

You are a mailman in a calm and peaceful neighborhood who is in charge of receiving messages and sending them to the correct houses. You're in a rush, so you have to be quick about it!

How to play: Grab one mail from the post office and deliver it to the correct house.  

You have to be close to the house in order to deliver the mail and allow the neighbor to receive the message

 Becareful, you will be penalized if you accidentally deliver it to the wrong house, choose the wrong mail, OR don't select the correct mail in time.

You have 2 minutes to achieve a high amount of mail points.

Controls: 

WASD Movement

Left click: Interact with the post office and the houses when within range.

All of the programming, art, and sound was created by me!

Unity Asset Font used:

Free Pixel Font - Thaleah - Tiny Worlds
